Key Match Events: Philadelphia 76ers forward Paul George hyperextended his left knee during the second quarter of the 76ers' 104-89 preseason victory over the host Atlanta Hawks.
Post-Match Reflections: Philadelphia coach Nick Nurse said after the game, 'Hopefully it'll be OK so he's back with us right away.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul George made one of the biggest splashes in free agency this summer when he signed a four-year, $212 million contract with the Sixers.
Philadelphia has two more preseason games before opening the regular season against the visiting Milwaukee Bucks on Oct. 23.
Others: Paul George, 34, made 22.6 points, 5.2 rebounds, 3.5 assists and 1.5 steals in 74 games last season.
George sports career averages of 20.8 points, 6.3 boards, 3.7 assists and 1.7 steals, appearing in 867 games for the Indiana Pacers, Oklahoma City Thunder and the Clippers.
